LanguageData.PlantGrass.label: grass
LanguageData.PlantGrass.description: Wild grass. Grows anywhere there is a little light and minimally fertile ground.
LanguageData.PlantTallGrass.label: tall grass
LanguageData.PlantTallGrass.description: Wild tall grass. Slows down anyone moving over it.
LanguageData.PlantBush.label: bush
LanguageData.PlantBush.description: A short shrub. Does not typically talk.
LanguageData.PlantBrambles.label: brambles
LanguageData.PlantBrambles.description: Tangled, thorny, woody shoots covered with leaves. Slows down anyone moving over it a little bit.
LanguageData.PlantWildHealroot.label: wild healroot
LanguageData.PlantWildHealroot.description: A slow-growing plant which yields herbal medicine when harvested.\n\nThis wild breed of healroot is difficult to cultivate. It is prized by tribespeople in colder climates.
